member.name: T:WPILib.Extras.ActionCommand
member.summary: A will run an when it is initialized and will finish immediately.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.ActionCommand.#ctor(System.Action)
member.summary: Creates a new which will start the given when its is called.
member.param: The to run.

member.summary: Creates a new with a specific name, which will start the given when its is called.
member.param: The to run.
The name for the command.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.ActionCommand.End
member.summary: Called when the command ended peacefully

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.ActionCommand.Execute
member.summary: The execute method is called repeatedly until this either finishes or is canceled.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.ActionCommand.Initialize
member.summary: The initialize method is called the first time this Command is run after being started.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.ActionCommand.Interrupted
member.summary: Called when the command ends because somebody called or another command shared the same requirements as this one, and booted it out.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.ActionCommand.IsFinished
member.summary: Returns whether this command is finished.
member.returns: Whether this command is finished

member.summary: Called on the first time code enters the mode.

member.name: F:WPILib.Extras.CallContext.Execute
member.summary: Called every time after the first time.

member.name: T:WPILib.Extras.LabViewRobot
member.summary: The base class creates a robot which is structured similarly to a robot written in LabVIEW.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.LabViewRobot.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new .

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.LabViewRobot.Autonomous
member.summary: This method is called at the start of autonomous enabled and runs in a seperate thread.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.LabViewRobot.Begin
member.summary: Robot-wide initialization code should go here.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.LabViewRobot.Disabled(WPILib.Extras.CallContext)
member.summary: This method is called for every packet sent in Disabled. Use the callContext parameter to determine if initial call or execution calls.
member.param: Init if first call, otherwise Execute

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.LabViewRobot.StartCompetition
member.summary: This function is called by the initializer to start the main loop.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.LabViewRobot.Teleoperated(WPILib.Extras.CallContext)
member.summary: This method is called for every packet sent in Teleoperated Enabled. Use the callContext parameter to determine if initial call or execution calls.
member.param: Init if first call, otherwise Execute

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.LabViewRobot.Test
member.summary: This method is called at the start of test mode and runs in a seperate thread. Note that this will run in both Test Disabled and Test Enabled.

member.summary: Constructs the AHRS class using serial communication.
member.param: The Serial Port to use.
Either (Default) or .
The Update Rate (Hz) [4..60] (Default 50)

member.summary: Constructs the AHRS class using SPI Communication

member.summary: Constructs the AHRS class using SPI Communication, overriding the SPI bitrate.

The SPI bitrate to use (bits/seconds) (Maximum: 2,000,000)

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.Calibrate
member.summary: Not needed on the NavX. Calibration is Automatic.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetAltitude
member.summary: Returns the current altitude.
member.returns: Current altitude in meters (if valid).

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetAngle
member.summary: Returns the total accumulated yaw angle (Z Axis, in degrees) reported by the sensor.
member.returns: The total accumulated yaw angle (Z axis) of the robot in degrees.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetBarometricPressure
member.summary: Returns the current barometric pressure.
member.returns: Current barometric pressure in millibar (NavX aero only).

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetBoardYawAxis
member.summary: Returns information regarding which sensor board axis (X, Y or Z) and direction (up/down) is currently configured to report angle values.
member.returns: The currently-configured board yaw axis/direction.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetByteCount
member.summary: Returns the count in bytes of data recieved from the sensor.
member.returns: The number of bytes received from the sensor.

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetCompassHeading
member.summary: Returns the current tilt-compensated compass heading value (in degrees, from 0 to 360) reported by the sensor.
member.returns: The current tilt-compensated compass heading, in degrees (0-360).

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetDisplacementX
member.summary: Returns the last displacement of the X axis since was last invoked [Experimental].
member.returns: The Current X axis displacement since last reset (meters).

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetDisplacementY
member.summary: Returns the last displacement of the Y axis since was last invoked [Experimental].
member.returns: The Current Y axis displacement since last reset (meters).

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetDisplacementZ
member.summary: Returns the last displacement of the Z axis since was last invoked [Experimental].
member.returns: The Current Z axis displacement since last reset (meters).

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetFirmwareVersion
member.summary: Returns the version number of the firmware currently executing on the sensor.
member.returns: The firmware version in the format [MajorVersion].[MinorVersion]

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetFusedHeading
member.summary: Returns the "fused" (9-axis) heading.
member.returns: Fused Heading in Degrees (range 0-360).

member.summary: Returns the current pitch value (in degrees, from -180 to 180) reported by the sensor.
member.returns: The current pitch value in degrees (-180 to 180).

member.name: M:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.GetPressure

member.summary: Indicates whether the current magnetic field strength diverges from the calibrated value for the earth's magnetic field by more than the currently- configured Magnetic Disturbance Ratio.

member.name: F:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.BoardYawAxis.Up
member.summary: True if axis is up, otherwise down.

member.name: T:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.SerialDataType
member.summary: The enum specifies the type of data to be streamed from the sensor.

member.name: F:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.SerialDataType.KProcessedData
member.summary: (Default): 6 and 9 axis processed data.

member.name: F:WPILib.Extras.NavX.AHRS.SerialDataType.KRawData
member.summary: Unprocessed data from each individual sensor.
